name: Watch Out: PC Edition
description:
Watch Out is a Driving Survival game
Reach the finish line to unlock the next level
Try to survive...
150 levels featuring 5 Tuned and lowered cars with different genres, Mixing between Reality and Craziness:
Hatchback - Suicide - Drift Beast - Diamond - Desert King
Watch Out PC Edition is an edition made specially for computers, The graphics got enhanced, Added Post processing effects to the camera, New style tuned cars, New main menu, Reworked on User Interface system to match the PCs, Added support for controllers.

Changes Made in V3.1.0:-

• Added support for Gamer Pirate Launcher
• Adjusted the wheel offset for Hatchback
• Increased wheel size for Hatchback
• Fixed the Jumping Car bug
• Fixed the double clicked buttons in Main Menu
• Decreased game size
